column5: Check this out, at least this Western Newspaper has a Spine and will not advertise this insane add  http://blog.P3TA.org/archives/2008/08/cannibalistic_a.php  As for my self, when I eat my steak am I supposed to feel or be like the Be-header.  Totally Ridiculous.  I hope these guys get some payback like a good Bea/////, never mind too many Softies here.

This is just ridiculous.  I'm flabbergasted.  Humans have canines and incisors for a reason.  We are omnivorous.  But I do agree with them that food-animals should not be treated in such a dispicable manner prior to slaughter.
Try reading the board before you post... this was posted by Justin a few hours earlier.
Im sooooo embarrassed.  The Cons of working late and the time change, and in a hurry to watch the RoughRiders
I guess a poor excuse is better than no excuse eh?
